query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 «O Padre nostro, che ne’ cieli stai, 2 non circunscritto, ma per più amore 3 ch’ai primi effetti di là sù tu hai,
4 laudato sia ’l tuo nome e ’l tuo valore 5 da ogne creatura, com’ è degno 6 di render grazie al tuo dolce vapore.
query.result:
**English:**
1 "Our Father, who art in the heavens, 2 not circumscribed, but for more love 3 that thou hast for the first effects from up there,
4 praised be thy name and thy worth 5 by every creature, as is worthy 6 to give thanks to thy sweet breath.
**Malay:**
1 "Wahai Bapa kami, yang berada di syurga, 2 tidak terbatas, tetapi karena lebih banyak cinta 3 yang Engkau miliki untuk efek pertama dari atas sana,
4 terpujilah nama-Mu dan nilai-Mu 5 oleh setiap makhluk, sebagaimana layaknya 6 untuk bersyukur atas nafas-Mu yang manis.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Vegna ver’ noi la pace del tuo regno, 8 ché noi ad essa non potem da noi, 9 s’ella non vien, con tutto nostro ingegno.
query.result:
**English:**
7 May the peace of your kingdom come to us, 8 because we cannot attain it by ourselves, 9 even with all our efforts, unless it comes to us.
**Malay:**
7 Semoga kedamaian kerajaan-Mu datang kepada kami, 8 karena kami tidak dapat mencapainya sendiri, 9 jika ia tidak datang, dengan segala upaya kami.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Come del suo voler li angeli tuoi 11 fan sacrificio a te, cantando osanna, 12 così facciano li uomini de’ suoi.
query.result:
**English:**
10 As Your angels make sacrifice to You of their will, 11 singing hosanna, 12 so may men do of theirs.
**Malay:**
10 Sebagaimana para malaikat-Mu mempersembahkan pengorbanan kepada-Mu sesuai dengan kehendak mereka, 11 menyanyikan hosana, 12 demikianlah hendaknya manusia melakukannya sesuai dengan kehendak mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Dà oggi a noi la cotidiana manna, 14 sanza la qual per questo aspro diserto 15 a retro va chi più di gir s’affanna.
query.result:
**English:**
13 Give us this day our daily bread, 14 without which in this harsh desert 15 he who strives to advance goes backward.
**Malay:**
13 Berikanlah kepada kami pada hari ini makanan kami yang secukupnya, 14 yang tanpanya di padang pasir yang keras ini 15 barangsiapa yang berusaha untuk maju akan mundur.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 E come noi lo mal ch’avem sofferto 17 perdoniamo a ciascuno, e tu perdona 18 benigno, e non guardar lo nostro merto.
query.result:
**English:**
16 And as we pardon each other the evil that we have suffered, 17 you also, being gracious, pardon us, 18 and do not look at our merit.
**Malay:**
16 Dan sebagaimana kami mengampuni kejahatan yang telah kami derita, 17 Engkau juga, dengan murah hati, ampunilah kami, 18 dan janganlah melihat jasa kami.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Nostra virtù che di legger s’adona, 20 non spermentar con l’antico avversaro, 21 ma libera da lui che sì la sprona.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Quest’ ultima preghiera, segnor caro, 23 già non si fa per noi, ché non bisogna, 24 ma per color che dietro a noi restaro».
query.result:
**English:**
22 This last prayer, dear Lord, 23 is no longer made for us, because it is not needed, 24 but for those who will remain after us.
**Malay:**
22 Doa terakhir ini, Tuhan yang terkasih, 23 tidak lagi dibuat untuk kami, karena tidak diperlukan, 24 tetapi untuk mereka yang akan tetap tinggal setelah kami.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Così a sé e noi buona ramogna 26 quell’ ombre orando, andavan sotto ’l pondo, 27 simile a quel che talvolta si sogna,
28 disparmente angosciate tutte a tondo 29 e lasse su per la prima cornice, 30 purgando la caligine del mondo.
query.result:
**English:**
25 Thus praying for themselves and us, 26 those shades went beneath their burdens, 27 like those sometimes seen in dreams,
28 all of them variously distressed, going round and round 29 and weary on the first ledge, 30 purging away the darkness of the world.
**Malay:**
25 Demikianlah berdoa untuk diri mereka sendiri dan kita, 26 bayangan-bayangan itu berjalan di bawah beban mereka, 27 seperti yang kadang-kadang terlihat dalam mimpi,
28 semuanya sangat menderita, berputar-putar 29 dan lelah di langkan pertama, 30 membersihkan kegelapan dunia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Se di là sempre ben per noi si dice, 32 di qua che dire e far per lor si puote 33 da quei c’hanno al voler buona radice?
34 Ben si de’ loro atar lavar le note 35 che portar quinci, sì che, mondi e lievi, 36 possano uscire a le stellate ruote.
query.result:
**English:**
31 If over there good is always said of us, 32 what can be said and done for them here 33 by those who have a good root to their will?
34 Their stains must indeed be washed away 35 that they bring from here, so that, clean and light, 36 they may emerge to the starry wheels.
**Malay:**
31 Jika di sana kebaikan selalu dikatakan tentang kita, 32 di sini apa yang dapat dikatakan dan dilakukan untuk mereka 33 oleh mereka yang memiliki akar yang baik untuk keinginan mereka?
34 Noda-noda mereka memang harus dibersihkan 35 yang mereka bawa dari sini, sehingga, bersih dan ringan, 36 mereka dapat muncul ke roda-roda bintang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 «Deh, se giustizia e pietà vi disgrievi 38 tosto, sì che possiate muover l’ala, 39 che secondo il disio vostro vi lievi,
40 mostrate da qual mano inver’ la scala 41 si va più corto; e se c’è più d’un varco, 42 quel ne ’nsegnate che men erto cala;
43 ché questi che vien meco, per lo ’ncarco 44 de la carne d’Adamo onde si veste, 45 al montar sù, contra sua voglia, è parco».
query.result:
**English:**
37 "Oh, if justice and pity grieve you 38 quickly, so that you may move your wings, 39 that according to your desire you may rise,
40 show from which hand toward the stairway 41 one goes more quickly; and if there is more than one passage, 42 teach us the one that descends less steeply;
43 for this one who comes with me, because of the burden 44 of the flesh of Adam with which he is clothed, 45 is slow to climb, against his will."
**Malay:**
37 "Oh, jika keadilan dan belas kasihan membuat kalian sedih 38 cepatlah, sehingga kalian dapat menggerakkan sayap kalian, 39 sehingga sesuai dengan keinginan kalian, kalian dapat bangkit,
40 tunjukkan dari tangan yang mana menuju tangga 41 seseorang pergi lebih cepat; dan jika ada lebih dari satu jalan, 42 ajarkan kami jalan yang tidak terlalu curam;
43 karena orang yang datang bersamaku ini, karena beban 44 daging Adam yang dikenakannya, 45 lambat untuk mendaki, bertentangan dengan keinginannya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 E s’io non fossi impedito dal sasso 53 che la cervice mia superba doma, 54 onde portar convienmi il viso basso,
55 cotesti, ch’ancor vive e non si noma, 56 guardere’ io, per veder s’i’ ’l conosco, 57 e per farlo pietoso a questa soma.
query.result:
**English:**
52 And if I were not impeded by the rock 53 that humbles my proud neck, 54 so that I am forced to keep my face down,
55 I would look at those who are still alive and not named, 56 to see if I recognize them, 57 and to make them feel pity for this burden.
**Malay:**
52 Dan jika aku tidak terhalang oleh batu 53 yang menundukkan leherku yang sombong, 54 sehingga aku terpaksa menundukkan wajahku,
55 orang-orang itu, yang masih hidup dan tidak disebutkan namanya, 56 akan kulihat, untuk melihat apakah aku mengenal mereka, 57 dan untuk membuat mereka berbelas kasih terhadap beban ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Io fui latino e nato d’un gran Tosco: 59 Guiglielmo Aldobrandesco fu mio padre; 60 non so se ’l nome suo già mai fu vosco.
query.result:
**English:**
58 I was Latin and born of a great Tuscan: 59 Guglielmo Aldobrandesco was my father; 60 I do not know if his name ever reached you.
**Malay:**
58 Aku orang Latin dan lahir dari seorang Tuscan yang hebat: 59 Guglielmo Aldobrandesco adalah ayahku; 60 aku tidak tahu apakah namanya pernah sampai kepada kalian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 L’antico sangue e l’opere leggiadre 62 d’i miei maggior mi fer sì arrogante, 63 che, non pensando a la comune madre,
64 ogn’ uomo ebbi in despetto tanto avante, 65 ch’io ne mori’, come i Sanesi sanno, 66 e sallo in Campagnatico ogne fante.
query.result:
**English:**
61 The ancient blood and the noble deeds 62 of my ancestors made me so arrogant, 63 that, not thinking of our common mother,
64 I held every man in such great contempt, 65 that I killed them, as the people of Siena know, 66 and every foot soldier in Campagnatico knows it.
**Malay:**
61 Darah kuno dan perbuatan mulia 62 para leluhurku membuatku begitu sombong, 63 sehingga, tidak memikirkan ibu kita bersama,
64 aku sangat menghina setiap orang, 65 sehingga aku membunuh mereka, seperti yang diketahui orang-orang Siena, 66 dan setiap prajurit di Campagnatico mengetahuinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Io sono Omberto; e non pur a me danno 68 superbia fa, ché tutti miei consorti 69 ha ella tratti seco nel malanno.
query.result:
**English:**
67 I am Omberto; and not only to me does 68 pride do harm, for it has dragged all my companions 69 with it into misfortune.
**Malay:**
67 Akulah Omberto; dan bukan hanya kepadaku 68 kesombongan berbuat jahat, karena semua sahabatku 69 telah diseretnya bersama ke dalam kemalangan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 E qui convien ch’io questo peso porti 71 per lei, tanto che a Dio si sodisfaccia, 72 poi ch’io nol fe’ tra ’ vivi, qui tra ’ morti».
query.result:
**English:**
70 And here it is fitting that I bear this burden 71 for her, so that God may be satisfied, 72 since I did not do it among the living, here among the dead."
**Malay:**
70 Dan di sinilah pantas bagiku untuk memikul beban ini 71 untuknya, sehingga Tuhan merasa puas, 72 karena aku tidak melakukannya di antara yang hidup, di sini di antara yang mati."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Ascoltando chinai in giù la faccia; 74 e un di lor, non questi che parlava, 75 si torse sotto il peso che li ’mpaccia,
76 e videmi e conobbemi e chiamava, 77 tenendo li occhi con fatica fisi 78 a me che tutto chin con loro andava.
query.result:
**English:**
73 Listening, I bent my face down; 74 and one of them, not the one who was speaking, 75 twisted under the weight that encumbers them,
76 and saw me and recognized me and called out to me, 77 keeping his eyes fixed on me with difficulty, 78 as I walked along, completely bent over, with them.
**Malay:**
73 Mendengar, aku menundukkan wajahku; 74 dan salah seorang dari mereka, bukan yang sedang berbicara, 75 membungkuk di bawah beban yang membebaninya,
76 dan melihatku dan mengenali diriku dan memanggilku, 77 menjaga matanya tetap tertuju padaku dengan susah payah, 78 saat aku berjalan, sepenuhnya membungkuk, bersama mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 «Oh!», diss’ io lui, «non se’ tu Oderisi, 80 l’onor d’Agobbio e l’onor di quell’ arte 81 ch’alluminar chiamata è in Parisi?».
query.result:
**English:**
79 "Oh!" I said to him, "aren't you Oderisi, 80 the honor of Gubbio and the honor of that art 81 that is called illuminating in Paris?"
**Malay:**
79 "Oh!" kataku kepadanya, "bukankah kamu Oderisi, 80 kehormatan Gubbio dan kehormatan seni itu 81 yang disebut iluminasi di Paris?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 «Frate», diss’ elli, «più ridon le carte 83 che pennelleggia Franco Bolognese; 84 l’onore è tutto or suo, e mio in parte.
query.result:
**English:**
82 "Brother," he said, "the cards laugh more 83 than Franco Bolognese's paintbrush; 84 the honor is all his now, and mine in part.
**Malay:**
82 "Saudaraku," katanya, "kartu-kartu lebih tertawa 83 daripada kuas pelukis Franco Bolognese; 84 kehormatan itu semua miliknya sekarang, dan sebagian milikku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Ben non sare’ io stato sì cortese 86 mentre ch’io vissi, per lo gran disio 87 de l’eccellenza ove mio core intese.
query.result:
**English:**
85 Truly I would not have been so courteous 86 while I was alive, because of the great desire 87 for the excellence to which my heart aspired.
**Malay:**
85 Sungguh aku tidak akan bersikap sopan 86 ketika aku masih hidup, karena hasrat yang besar 87 untuk keunggulan yang dicita-citakan oleh hatiku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Di tal superbia qui si paga il fio; 89 e ancor non sarei qui, se non fosse 90 che, possendo peccar, mi volsi a Dio.
query.result:
**English:**
88 Here in such pride is the penalty paid; 89 and I would not be here now, if it were not 90 that, having the power to sin, I turned to God.
**Malay:**
88 Di dalam kesombongan seperti ini hukuman dibayar; 89 dan aku tidak akan berada di sini sekarang, jika tidak 90 karena, memiliki kuasa untuk berdosa, aku berpaling kepada Tuhan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Oh vana gloria de l’umane posse! 92 com’ poco verde in su la cima dura, 93 se non è giunta da l’etati grosse!
94 Credette Cimabue ne la pittura 95 tener lo campo, e ora ha Giotto il grido, 96 sì che la fama di colui è scura.
query.result:
**English:**
91 Oh, vain glory of human power! 92 How little greenery remains on its enduring peak, 93 if it has not come from the great ages!
94 Cimabue thought he held the field in painting, 95 and now Giotto has the acclaim, 96 so that the fame of the former is obscured.
**Malay:**
91 Oh, kemuliaan yang sia-sia dari kekuatan manusia! 92 Betapa sedikit hijaunya yang tersisa di puncaknya yang abadi, 93 jika itu tidak datang dari zaman-zaman yang agung!
94 Cimabue percaya bahwa dialah yang terbaik dalam melukis, 95 dan sekarang Giotto yang dipuji, 96 sehingga ketenarannya memudar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Così ha tolto l’uno a l’altro Guido 98 la gloria de la lingua; e forse è nato 99 chi l’uno e l’altro caccerà del nido.
query.result:
**English:**
97 Thus one Guido has taken from the other 98 the glory of the language; and perhaps one is born 99 who will drive both of them from the nest.
**Malay:**
97 Demikianlah seorang Guido telah mengambil dari yang lain 98 kemuliaan bahasa; dan mungkin telah lahir 99 orang yang akan mengusir keduanya dari sarang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Non è il mondan romore altro ch’un fiato 101 di vento, ch’or vien quinci e or vien quindi, 102 e muta nome perché muta lato.
query.result:
**English:**
100 The worldly clamor is nothing but a breath 101 of wind, which now comes from here and now from there, 102 and changes name because it changes direction.
**Malay:**
100 Keriuhan duniawi tidak lain hanyalah hembusan 101 angin, yang terkadang datang dari sini dan terkadang datang dari sana, 102 dan berubah nama karena berubah arah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Che voce avrai tu più, se vecchia scindi 104 da te la carne, che se fossi morto 105 anzi che tu lasciassi il ‘pappo’ e ’l ‘dindi’,
106 pria che passin mill’ anni? ch’è più corto 107 spazio a l’etterno, ch’un muover di ciglia 108 al cerchio che più tardi in cielo è torto.
query.result:
**English:**
103 What voice will you have more, if, being old, you separate 104 the flesh from you, than if you were dead 105 before you left the ‘pap’ and the ‘dinari’,
106 before a thousand years pass? For shorter 107 is the space to eternity than a movement of the eyelashes 108 to the circle that is drawn latest in the sky.
**Malay:**
103 Suara apakah yang akan kau miliki lagi, jika, ketika tua, kau pisahkan 104 daging darimu, daripada jika kau mati 105 sebelum kau tinggalkan ‘pap’ dan ‘dindi’,
106 sebelum seribu tahun berlalu? Karena lebih pendek 107 jarak ke keabadian daripada gerakan bulu mata 108 ke lingkaran yang terakhir digambar di langit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Colui che del cammin sì poco piglia 110 dinanzi a me, Toscana sonò tutta; 111 e ora a pena in Siena sen pispiglia,
112 ond’ era sire quando fu distrutta 113 la rabbia fiorentina, che superba 114 fu a quel tempo sì com’ ora è putta.
query.result:
**English:**
109 He who takes so little of the road 110 before me, all Tuscany resounded; 111 and now hardly a whisper in Siena,
112 where he was lord when the Florentine rage was destroyed, 113 which was so proud at that time as it is now a whore.
**Malay:**
109 Dia yang mengambil sedikit jalan 110 di depanku, seluruh Tuscany bergema; 111 dan sekarang hampir tidak ada bisikan di Siena,
112 di mana dia adalah penguasa ketika kemarahan Florentine dihancurkan, 113 yang begitu sombong pada waktu itu seperti sekarang ini adalah pelacur.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 La vostra nominanza è color d’erba, 116 che viene e va, e quei la discolora 117 per cui ella esce de la terra acerba».
query.result:
**English:**
115 Your fame is like the color of grass, 116 which comes and goes, and that discolors it 117 from which it emerges from the bitter earth.
**Malay:**
115 Nama baik kalian itu seperti warna rumput, 116 yang datang dan pergi, dan yang memudarkannya 117 dari tempat ia tumbuh dari tanah yang pahit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 E io a lui: «Tuo vero dir m’incora 119 bona umiltà, e gran tumor m’appiani; 120 ma chi è quei di cui tu parlavi ora?».
query.result:
**English:**
118 And I to him: "Your true saying 119 humbles me, and levels my great pride; 120 but who is he of whom you were speaking just now?".
**Malay:**
118 Dan aku kepadanya: "Perkataanmu yang benar 119 merendahkan hatiku, dan meratakan kesombonganku yang besar; 120 tetapi siapakah dia yang baru saja kau bicarakan?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 «Quelli è», rispuose, «Provenzan Salvani; 122 ed è qui perché fu presuntüoso 123 a recar Siena tutta a le sue mani.
query.result:
**English:**
121 "That one is," he replied, "Provenzan Salvani; 122 and he is here because he was presumptuous 123 in trying to bring all of Siena under his control.
**Malay:**
121 "Itulah," jawabnya, "Provenzan Salvani; 122 dan dia ada di sini karena dia sombong 123 dalam mencoba untuk membawa seluruh Siena di bawah kendalinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Ito è così e va, sanza riposo, 125 poi che morì; cotal moneta rende 126 a sodisfar chi è di là troppo oso».
query.result:
**English:**
124 Thus it is and goes, without rest, 125 after he dies; such coin does he render 126 to satisfy him who is too bold over there.
**Malay:**
124 Demikianlah keadaannya dan terus berlangsung, tanpa henti, 125 setelah ia mati; uang logam seperti itu diberikannya 126 untuk memuaskan orang yang terlalu berani di sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 E io: «Se quello spirito ch’attende, 128 pria che si penta, l’orlo de la vita, 129 qua giù dimora e qua sù non ascende,
130 se buona orazïon lui non aita, 131 prima che passi tempo quanto visse, 132 come fu la venuta lui largita?».
query.result:
**English:**
127 And I: "If that spirit which awaits, 128 before it repents, the end of life, 129 dwells down here and does not ascend above,
130 if good prayers do not help it, 131 before as much time passes as it lived, 132 how was its coming here granted to it?".
**Malay:**
127 Dan aku: "Jika roh yang menunggu, 128 sebelum ia bertaubat, akhir kehidupan, 129 berdiam di sini dan tidak naik ke atas,
130 jika doa yang baik tidak membantunya, 131 sebelum waktu berlalu sebanyak yang dijalaninya, 132 bagaimana kedatangannya ke sini diizinkan?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Più non dirò, e scuro so che parlo; 140 ma poco tempo andrà, che ’ tuoi vicini 141 faranno sì che tu potrai chiosarlo.
query.result:
**English:**
139 I will say no more, and I know that I speak obscurely; 140 but a little while will pass, and your neighbors 141 will make it so that you will be able to interpret it.
**Malay:**
139 Aku tidak akan berkata lebih banyak, dan aku tahu bahwa aku berbicara samar-samar; 140 tetapi sedikit waktu akan berlalu, dan tetangga-tetanggamu 141 akan membuatmu bisa menafsirkannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 Quest’ opera li tolse quei confini».
query.result:
**English:**
142 This work took them out of those confines.
**Malay:**
142 Karya ini membawa mereka keluar dari batas-batas itu.
